root: ^A collection of massive orange crystals stands out from its dark surroundings, casting strange shadows upon the stone walls.

skip: ^"Y'got the right idea, [[class]], best steer clear of those. Regar worked with many-a-stone, but this is something else. Jus' something wrong with it and I cannae put me finger on it."

^You tentatively move towards the closest of orange clusters. Gazing into the warm light of the amber jewel, you notice the shapes deep inside the gemstone are remarkably humanoid, trapped inside the vibrant resin.

c-2: ^Your [[weapon]] strikes the strange formation. Thin cracks start to form as an overpowering sense of anguish starts to fill your soul. Suddenly, a thick, black mist coalesces behind you and a clawed hand reaches for your weapon.
c-3: ^You wipe away the soot covering the orange surface only to reveal a grizzled face with human eyes that plead desperately to be freed. You step back in horror as a black mist coalesces and a tall demoness steps out from the darkness.

intro: ^The demon scowls, pointing a finger at her eyes. “Look, but don't touch! Is that too much to ask?”. The demon briefly glances at the crystal before wrapping a protective arm around the figure stepping out of the dark mist next to her.

c-4: ^ "Me?" the succubus smiles, flicks her tail low to the ground, and pats the head of the ensorcelled and cloaked priest at her side. "They want to know about little Serena! Isn't that sweet, puppet?"
c-5: ^ "She's a pretty puppet, isn't she?” She gazes into the entrapped woman’s eyes. “I wanted to get the other one too, but he got away. Nearly took my hand off!” she pauses, biting her lip and daydreaming a bit.

puppet: ^The 'puppet' wears the trappings of a priest of the White Rose. Despite the lack of crystals on her, she seems to be under the same spell most of the denizens in these caves have succumbed to.
release: ^"Now why would I do that? You can't bully me like old Bad Temper up in his castle. If you want to play with my puppets, come find me!"
trade: ^"Not so fast! Why don't we have some fun first? Come find me, and maybe - MAYBE - we can make a deal! Maybe not. Maybe I'll just make you my puppet instead! You seem pretty."
end: ^The black smoke swirls once more, whisking the demon and her 'puppet' away, leaving you back in the strangely illuminated hallways of the Ambermines.

^"Crazy? CRAZY? That's not very nice. Is it, puppet?" the demon smiles a deadly smile. “Not nice at all.” The demoness turns the priestess's head left to right with her sharp-nailed fingers. "Show them some manners, puppet!"

c-11: ^The priest stands dazed for a moment as the demoness’s influence visibly subsides.

^"I... I thank you, [[class]]. That was a noble thing to do. Not many here have the willpower to stand up to that demoness. These crystals amplify her suggestions. Or perhaps, she amplifies the crystal’s suggestions.

c-12: ^"I am Viola Skysword, high priestess of the Order of the White Rose. I was summoned to support the Dawnbringer, as the prophecy foretold."

c-0: ^"The Dawnbringer is our champion of the light. He shall free Shattered Realms from the darkness. Every few hundred years Rae sends one of her children to aid our battle against the ever-encroaching darkness."

c-13: ^"We... I mean, I was part of the Dawnbringer's entourage. We were searching for a way into the Black Citadel when a demoness attacked us."
^"And then the Dawnbringer just... left us! I couldn't believe my eyes as he fled into one of the tunnels."
c-14: ^"I don't know - there must be something down there he needed very much. There was something in his eyes that... frightened me."

c-0: ^The priest nods, and hands you a Sun-shaped amulet. "The White Rose shall aid you, hero. May this amulet aid you in the journey ahead. I shall pray that Rae looks kindly upon your quest."
